ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 81
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, Xillith .... Let see where should I begin.... I like (not love) my shadowknight (Tenin).  My 2 biggest problems right now about this class is: 1) I have
ygData.messageBody:
OK, Xillith .... Let see where should I begin....

I like (not love) my shadowknight (Tenin). My 2 biggest problems right now
about this class is:

1) I have played him for 16 days and only 16th level. You might ask what
the problem is. I started a Shaman out 5 playing days ago and he is now
16th level. Last night I had 2 guild invites and my SK never had one (until
I asked a guild, get into that in a moment). The only reason I started a
Shaman because I heard they were wanted in groups, and I always had a rough
time finding anyone who wanted to group with me. Anyway found a guild that
let me join and asked if anyone wanted to form a group or could I join,
never got a response back, so I end up soloing, which everyone knows the
problems with that.

2) Armor. In east commons and "/auction WTB banded armor" and have never
gotten a response. Now I have heard of suits selling for around 75 plat but
never could find anyone selling any banded. OK back to guild, "do we have
any one making banded armor" ... "yes it is xxxx, and should be on tonight"
well suffice it to say they never were on that night or any other time that
I was on. So I still am running around in leather, with a SBH that I bought
from someone for 100 plat.

I normally don't get upset at things, but this I feel is just insane. I was
reading on another list that Brian/Veriant thinks SK Troll/Orge is fine but
the DE/Human is just screwed but any type of modification other than
equipment would make the entire class unbalanced. He/They (whomever) found
that the Mage Tank (anti-paladin) was unacceptable, and was a scary thing to
see.... hmm... aren't we suppose to be? Personally I would think that if
you have a higher experience penalty you should be stronger than the other
classes that don't have the penalty. Anyway, until something is done where
I can get armor that is worth anything (because I can't take the hits from
the MOB's anymore) I will be packing Tenin away for a while, maybe will get
back to him someday when I can tweak him out or something, whatever needs to
be done I don't see any other route other than tweaking. (truthfully really
hate saying that because I shouldn't have to do that, but I feel I have been
forced into it).

Oh, last thing... sniped it out but you said that the zombie is like blue to
a level 33, lets just say I will never be able to kill it at 16, so that
isn't a solution for me. The complete heal would be nice, especially if the
lady could recharge that too. (by the way where is Gix?)

If anyone has any suggestions I would be willing to listen, but I think I
have given up on him for the time being.

Tenin-Tarew Marr
David


-----Original Message-----
From: Xillith ofNeriak [mailto:xillith@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 12:49 AM
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Digest Number 81


From: "Xillith ofNeriak" <xillith@...>

<snip>
For all you young SKs out there, DONT GIVE UP!!! I almost quit in disgust
many times and I am on a PvP server, so I have that to deal with at times as
well. But I love my charecter so much I stuck with it. The SK suffers SO
much at low levels, but once you crest over 20 and get your dual attack, and
then 22 where you get some minor healing and other usefull spells if you're
rescourcefull...there is no looking back. I often have 130 dammage sets if
I DONT reposte, and no dual wield weapons anyone can get untwinked at my
level come close to compeating. Our pet now contributes in PvP (THEY
LISTENED!!) and I find my class being more welcome in groups than the
paladin or ranger.

<unsnip>
